pages.text: $(li)The Crimson Mosquito Proboscis can be used to craft multiple weapons known as $(l:patchouli:weapons/blood_sprayer)Blood Sprayer$(/l), $(l:patchouli:weapons/hemolymph_blaster)Hemolymph Blaster$(/l), or the $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/crimson_mosquito_larva)Crimson Mosquito Larva$(/l) item in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be rarely dropped by a $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/crimson_mosquito)Crimson Mosquito$(/l).
pages.title: Mosquito Proboscis
